accentcolor.description: Choose the Unified Interface secondary theme color to be used on the process control

controlborder.description: Choose the color that controls will use for borders

controlshade.description: Choose the background color for controls to use to indicate when you hover over items

defaultcustomentitycolor.description: Choose the default custom entity color if no color is assigned

defaultentitycolor.description: Choose the default color for system entities if no color is assigned

globallinkcolor.description: Choose the color for all links, such as e-mail address and lookup links, and for all buttons that are in focus

headercolor.description: Choose the color for title text, such as form tab labels

hoverlinkeffect.description: Choose the color that commands or lists will use to indicate hovered over items

importsequencenumber.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

logotooltip.description: Enter text that will be used as the tooltip and alt text for the logo.

maincolor.description: Choose the Unified Interface primary theme color to be used on main command bar, buttons and tabs

name.description: The name of the Theme Entity.

navbarbackgroundcolor.description: Choose the primary Navigation Bar background color

navbarshelfcolor.description: Choose the secondary Navigation Bar background color

overriddencreatedon.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

pageheaderbackgroundcolor.description: Choose the page header background color

panelheaderbackgroundcolor.description: Choose the panel header background color

processcontrolcolor.description: Choose the primary background color for process controls

selectedlinkeffect.description: Choose the color that commands or lists will use to indicate selected items

utcconversiontimezonecode.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

drmmetadata.description: Metadata optional object used to describe this entry.

statuscode.description: Reason for the status of the Theme
